DOC.brief_summary: PTSD Coach mobile application ( app ) aim teach individual self-management strategy symptoms Post-traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) . Despite PTSD Coach 's use evidence-based cognitive behavioral strategy still need test effectiveness app manage PTSD symptom . There research evidence self-management program often underutilized , clinician contact increase patient involvement . The addition clinician support may enhance utilization effectiveness PTSD Coach . In Phase 1 investigator propose conduct stakeholder interview primary care ( PC ) mental health ( MH ) leadership staff investigate barrier facilitator implement Clinician-Supported ( CS-PTSD Coach ) increase uptake , use , impact PTSD Coach PC patient . The interview inform development CS-PTSD Coach protocol manual use phase 2 . In phase 2 investigator propose conduct feasibility study 30 ( 20 eligible ) PC Veterans diagnostic-level subthreshold PTSD symptom randomize receive Self-Managed ( SM ) PTSD Coach CS-PTSD Coach . The investigator ' specific aim 1 ) investigate feasibility recruit retain participant deliver SM CS condition 2 ) conduct preliminary investigation efficacy SM vs. CS . The investigator predict CS lead great treatment gain SM . Effect size generate follow outcome : ) reduction PTSD , depression , general distress , increase health-related functioning , b ) increase knowledge PTSD symptom , PTSD management strategy , patient cop self-efficacy , c ) increase initiation tradition PTSD treatment .
